docs.title: About Reference Design Guideline for PoV Vehicles
docs.text:
This document serves a guideline to design and deploy a TRL-6 privately-owned vehicles based on Autoware. The readers can take this document as a starting point to select and configure the hardware and software components of the vehicles.

We use the end-to-end foundation model on the privately-owned vehicles.

docs.title: Reference Design Guideline for PoV Vehicles documentation structure
docs.text:
The reference design WG publishes the guidelines for Privately-owned Vehicles (PoV), using the following document structure shown below.

TODO: The structure should be updated

For more details about the reference design WG, its goals and details of the Autoware Foundation working groups that oversees the project, refer to the Reference Design WG wiki

docs.title: Hardware Configuration
docs.text:
(To be completed)

This section describes the hardware configurations for PoV vehicles, including

  • Chassis: describes the design specification of the chassis
  • Sensors and Actuators: describes the sensors and actuators used in the reference design.
  • ECUs: describes the ECUs used in the reference design.

The sensors requirements are different based on different PoV version.

  • Vision Pilot

  • Vision Pilot Plus

  • Vision Pilot Pro

  • Vision Drive

docs.title: ECUs
docs.text:
The page lists the ECUs being tested for PoV, which can meet the computation capacity requirement of PoV but does not overprovision the resource requirements.

Reference: https://autowarefoundation.github.io/LSA-reference-design-docs/main/hardware-configuration/ECUs/

docs.title: Hardware Configuration
docs.text:
(To be completed)

The page lists the sensors and actuators being tested for PoV, which can support the ODD of PoV.

  • Vision Pilot
  • Camera:
    • 1 forward front-facing 8MP RGB camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view.
  • Vision Pilot Plus
  • Camera:
    • 1 forward front-facing 8MP RGB camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view.
  • 4D radar:
    • 1 forward front-facing high resolution (< 0.5 degree angular resolution) long range (300 m)
  • radar
    • 2x Blindspot monitoring automotive corner radars (front-left, front-right)
  • Vision Pilot Pro
  • Camera:
    • 3x 8MP RGB camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view. (forward-facing, front-right, front-left)
  • 4D radar:
    • 1 forward front-facing high resolution (< 0.5 degree angular resolution) long range (300 m)
  • radar
    • 2x Blindspot monitoring automotive corner radars (front-left, front-right)
    • Standard 2D Navigational map with GPS
  • Vision Drive
  • Camera:
    • 3x 8MP RGB camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view. (forward-facing, front-right, front-left)
  • 4D radar:
    • 1 forward front-facing high resolution (< 0.5 degree angular resolution) long range (300 m)
  • radar
    • 2x Blindspot monitoring automotive corner radars (front-left, front-right)
    • Standard 2D Navigational map with GPS
  • Infrared camera
    • 1x forward front-facing 8MP Short Wave Infrared camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view. (forward-facing, front-right, front-left)
    • 1x forward front-facing 8MP Long Wave Infrared camera with 120 degree horizontal field-of-view.

TODO: List some specific sensors models

docs.title: LIDARs
docs.text: For software configuration of these LiDAR sensors, see the Sensor Configuration Guide.

Software Configuration: See Velodyne LiDAR Configuration Guide

docs.title: ODD Definition
docs.text:
(To be completed)

Operation Domain Definition (ODD) describes the use scenarios for the vehicles to be designed and deployed. The deployed system should meet the ODD to be functionality completed. This section describes the ODD user scenarios for PoV.

The user scenario we focus on is the highway: 2 lanes of traffic or more, with contraflow traffic separated by a barrier or divider.

TODO: Is there any other scenarios?

TODO: How to define the different edge cases?

docs.title: PoV ODD definition
docs.text:
The page suggests the ODD use scenario for PoV.

Scenario ID Use Case Scenario Parameters and Values Demonstration LSA-CAM-0001 Normal driving ■ Initial condition・There is no NPC and no obstacle. EGO is running at Ve■ Action・EGO is running at Ve■ Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・EGO doesn't reach the destination　 Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0002 Following the vehicle in front ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and stays in the lane, follows the NPC■ Action・EGO follows the NPC at Ve. And NPC runs at Vf. EGO maintains the D[safe distance] from NPC■ Success condition・EGO reaches the destination ・EGO maintains the D[safe distance] from NPC■ Failure condition・Collide with the preceding vehicle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0003 Stop of the vehicle in front during following it ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and stays in the lane, follows the NPC■ Action・After a while NPC stops. EGO stops at D[safe distance] from the vehicle in front after it stopped.■ Success condition・EGO stops D[m] before the vehicle NPC■ Failure condition・Collide with NPC・EGO decelaration exceeds -0.26G Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0004 Cutting-in ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. NPC is running at Vf in the adjacent lane■ Action・NPC cuts in to the EGO vehicle's lane in distance D in front of the EGO vehicle at speed Vf. After the cut in, and EGO starts following NPC.■ Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : [Ve [km] / 2] LSA-CAM-0005 Cutting-out ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and stays in the lane, follows the NPC■ Action・When the distance between NPC and EGO is D, NPC cuts off. EGO stays in the lane■ Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0006 Driving over crosswalk while a pedestrian crossing on the crosswalk ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a pedestrian or bicycle on crosswalk.・(May need to define the ped/bicycle position and the direction.)■ Action・EGO detects the pedestrian or bicycle on the crosswalk and stops gently. After pedestrian or bicycle leaves the crosswalk, EGO keeps driving.■ Success condition・EGO stops because detection of pedestrian or bicycle on the crosswalk■ Failure condition ・Collide with the pedestrian or the bicycle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVp: [2, 3, 5] km/h LSA-CAM-0007 Driving over crosswalk ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and crosswalk is empty.■ Action・EGO runs at the constant speed of Ve■ Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0008 Driving over speed bump ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve■Action・EGO starts to decrease its speed to slow velocity (Vs) when D[m] distance left to speed bump. EGO passes the speed bump at Vs. After passing the speed bump completely, it starts to accelerate and continues driving at Ve.■Success condition・EGO drives at Vs over speed bump area・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・EGO doesn't drive at Vs over speed bump area・EGO decelaration exceeds -0.26G Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVs: [5] km/h, D: 3m LSA-CAM-0009 Stopping on stop line ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve■Action・EGO recognizes the stop line. It decelerates and stops before the stop line. After t[sec] EGO starts to move at Ve.■Success condition・EGO stops before the stop line, waits t[sec].・Ego reaches the destination.■Failure condition・EGO doesn't stop at the stop point・EGO doesn't move after waiting t[sec]・EGO decelaration exceeds -0.26G Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/ht[waiting time] : 3 sec LSA-CAM-0010 Recognize the traffic light signal ■Initial Condition・EGO is running at Ve■ActionEGO recognizes the status of the traffic signal D [m] ahead(1) as green, and EGO continues driving(2) as red, EGO stops(3) as green, and it changes to yellow (stopping distance from the EGO speed at the deceleration -0.26G)[m] before the signal. EGO decelerates and stops(4) as green, and it changes to yellow less than (stopping distance from the EGO speed at the deceleration -0.26G)[m] before the signal. EGO does not decelerate and enter the intersection(5) as red, the signal changes to green. EGO stops deceleration and starts acceleration■Success condition・EGO follows the traffic light rules■Failure condition・EGO does not behave as traffic light rules Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0011 Run-out ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a dog on the roadside.■Action・A dog runs out to road while EGO is driving. EGO detects the dog and stops gently. After dog leaves the road, EGO keeps driving.・May need to define the size and the speed of the dog.■Success condition・EGO stops because detection of dog・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the dog Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-00012 Run-out ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a pedestrian on the roadside.■Action・A pedestrian tries to crossing the road at Vp while EGO is driving. EGO detects the pedestrian and stops gently (<-0.26G). After pedestrian leaves the road, EGO keeps driving.■Success condition・EGO stops because of detection of pedestrian・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the pedestrian Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVp: [2, 3, 5] km/h UC-001-0013 A pedestrian on the road while driving ■ Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a pedestrian on the road.■ Action・A Pedestrian stops on the road while EGO is driving. EGO detects the pedestrian and stops gently (less than -0.26G). ■ Success condition・EGO stops because detection of pedestrian■ Failure condition・Collide with the pedestrian Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0014 Swerving around the static object ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a parked vehicle by the roadside. The lane width is wider enough to pass (i.e., 2 x vehicle width)■Action・EGO recognizes the obstacle on the roadside and starts taking action to pass the obstacle at D[m] distance. EGO must stay in the lane while passing the parked vehicle. ■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination.■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicle・EGO leaves the lane ・Lateral distance between EGO and parked vehicle is less than LD[m] Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 4mLD[safe distance] : 2m LSA-CAM-0015 Swerving around the static object ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a parked vehicle by the roadside. The land width is less than 2 x vehicle width.■Action・EGO recognizes the obstacle on the roadside and starts taking action to pass the obstacle at D[m] distance. EGO must stay in the lane while passing the parked vehicle. ■Success condition・EGO stops behind NPC.■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicle・EGO leaves the lane ・Lateral distance between EGO and parked vehicle is less than LD[m] Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 4mLD[safe distance] : 2m LSA-CAM-0016 Swerving around the pothole ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve■Action・EGO recognizes the pothole on the road and starts taking action to pass the obstacle at D[m] distance.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・EGO goes into pothole Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVs: [5] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0017 Swerving around the static object ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a bus by the roadside■Action・EGO recognizes the obstacle on the roadside and starts taking action to pass the obstacle at D[m] distance. EGO must stay in the lane while passing the bus. ■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・Collide with the bus or trees・EGO leaves the lane ・Lateral distance between EGO and the bus is less than LD[m] Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 4mLD[safe distance] : 2m LSA-CAM-0018 Occlusion Spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC running at Vf. There are too many trees on both sides of the road. EGO's field of vision is not clear.■Action・EGO detects the NPC in a limited field of view. It waits for the NPC. After NPC passes the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0019 Occlusion Spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC is running at Vf. There are too many trees on roadside. EGO's field of vision is not clear.■Action・EGO detects the NPC in a limited field of view. It waits for the NPC. After NPC passes the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0020 Occlusion Spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC is running at Vf. There are too many trees on roadside. EGO's field of vision is not clear.■Action・EGO detects the NPC in a limited field of view. It waits for the NPC. After NPC passes the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0021 Blind spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and making right turn. There are cyclists in EGO's blind spot. They are running at Vb■Action・EGO detects cyclists in the blind spot it waits for the cyclists. After cyclists pass the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the cyclists Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/h LSA-CAM-0022 Blind spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and making right turn at the intersection. There are cyclists in EGO's blind spot. They are running at Vb■Action・EGO detects cyclists in the blind spot it waits for the cyclists. After cyclists pass the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the cyclists Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/h LSA-CAM-0023 Blind spot ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve and making right turn at the intersection. There are cyclists and pedestrians in EGO's blind spot. Cyclists are running at Vb. Pedestrians are running at Vp.■Action・EGO detects cyclists in the blind spot it waits for the cyclists and pedestrians. After cyclists and pedestrians pass the EGO, EGO continues driving.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the cyclists・Collide with the pedestrians Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/hVp: [2, 3, 5] km/h LSA-CAM-0024 Driving in sloping road ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve in sloping road. ■Action・EGO keeps driving in sloping road without any break■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・EGO runs backwards on sloping road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0025 Driving in sloping road ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve in sloping road. There is an NPC in front of the EGO. It is running at Vf■Action・EGO keeps driving in sloping road without any break and keeps the safe distance[D] between NPC■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・EGO runs backwards on sloping road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0026 Run out in sloping road ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a pedestrian on the sloping roadside.■Action・A pedestrian tries to crossing road at Vp while EGO is driving. EGO detects the pedestrian and stops gently. After pedestrian leaves the road, EGO keeps driving.■Success condition・EGO stops because detection of pedestrian・EGO reaches the destination■ Failure condition・Collide with the pedestrian Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVp: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0027 NPC coming from opposite direction of the lane when EGO is in the same lane In Scenario Simulator v2, we cannot let NPC dynamically avoid EGO vehicle. We might need to predefine NPC path. Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 7m LSA-CAM-0028 NPC coming from opposite direction of the lane when EGO is in the other lane ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. An NPC comes from opposite direction of the lane in when EGO is in the other lane■Action・EGO keeps driving at Ve.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0029 NPC coming from opposite direction of the lane when EGO is in the same lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. An NPC comes from opposite direction in single-lane.■Action ・NPC coming from the opposite direction of the lane, EGO stops at a safe distance[D]. ■Success condition ・EGO stops at a safe distance[D]. ■Failure condition ・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 7m LSA-CAM-0030 NPC coming from opposite direction of the lane when EGO is in the same lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. An NPC comes from opposite direction in bi-directional lane.■Action ・NPC coming from the opposite direction of the lane, EGO stops at a safe distance[D]. ■Success condition ・EGO stops at a safe distance[D]. ■Failure condition ・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 7m LSA-CAM-0031 U-Turn ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. ■Action ・EGO makes a u-turn■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn’t complete the turn Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0032 U-Turn ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC in other lane. NPC is running at Vf.■Action ・EGO makes a U-turn onto the other lane if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC. ■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide wit the NPC・EGO doesn’t complete the turn Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0033 U-Turn ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. An NPC is running at Vf in other lane. Another NPC is running at Vf in front of the EGO.■Action ・EGO keeps the safe distance[D] between NPC. When this NPC leaves the front of EGO, EGO makes a u-turn U-turn onto the other lane if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide wit the NPC・EGO doesn’t complete the turn Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0034 Driving in main road ■Initial condition・EGO is driving in the main road■Action・(1) NPC waits to EGO and EGO keeps driving at Ve.・(2) If NPC doesn’t wait for EGO to pass first, EGO stops and waits to NPC.■Success condition・Driving on the main road without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC on the main road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [0, 10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0035 Driving in main road ■Initial condition・An NPC is stopping at the stop line and going to make a right turn onto the main road■Action・(1) NPC waits to EGO and EGO keeps driving at Ve.・(2) If NPC doesn’t wait to EGO, EGO stops and waits to NPC.■Success condition・Driving on the main road without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC on the main road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0036 T-Junction Turn ■Initial condition・EGO is going to make a left turn onto the t-junction■Action・On the t-junction, EGO makes a left turn onto the t-junction.■Success condition・Make a left turn onto the t-junction ■Failure condition・Can’t make a left turn onto the t-junction Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0037 T-Junction Turn ■Initial condition・EGO is stopping at the stop line and going to make a left turn onto the t-junction■Action・On the t-junction, EGO waits t[sec] at the stop line then makes a left turn onto the t-junction■Success condition・Make a left turn onto the main road without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC on the main road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/ht[waiting time] : 3 sec LSA-CAM-0038 T-Junction Turn and Interacting with Incoming Traffic ■Initial condition・EGO is going to make a left turn onto the main road■Action・On the main road, an NPC is approaching from the right in distance D[m] and at Vf. EGO makes a left turn onto the main road if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC. If it calculates that it may collide with the NPC, it stops until NPC leaves the main road■Success condition・Make a left turn onto the main road without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC on the main road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0039 T-Junction Turn and Interacting with Incoming Traffic ■Initial condition・EGO is stopping at the stop line and going to make a left turn onto the main road■Action・On the main road, an NPC is approaching from the right in distance D[m] and at Vf. EGO makes a left turn onto the main road if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC. If it calculates that it may collide with the NPC, it continues to stop at the stop line then make a left turn after the NPC passed■Success condition・Make a left turn onto the main road without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC on the main road Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0040 T-Junction Turn and Interacting with Incoming Traffic ■Initial condition・EGO is going to make a left turn. There is an NPC on the main road. NPC is running at Vf.■Action・On the t-junction, an NPC is approaching from the left in distance D[m] and at Vf. EGO makes a left turn onto the t-junction if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC. If it calculates that it may collide with the NPC, it stops until NPC leaves the road■Success condition・Make a left turn onto t-junction without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0041 T-Junction Turn and Interacting with Incoming Traffic ■Initial condition・EGO is stopping at the stop line and going to make a left turn. There is an NPC on the main road. NPC is running at Vf.■Action・On the t-junction, an NPC is approaching from the left in distance D[m] and at Vf. EGO makes a left turn onto the t-junction if it estimates that it will not collide with the NPC. If it calculates that it may collide with the NPC, it continues to stop at the stop line■Success condition・Make a left turn onto t-junction without colliding with the NPC■Failure condition・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3mt[waiting time] : 3 sec LSA-CAM-0042 Driving in intersection ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a parked vehicle in the intersection.■Action・EGO detects the parked vehicle and stops gently at D[m] distance■Success condition・Stop due to parked vehicle■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0043 There are parked vehicles on the both sides ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There are parked vehicles on both sides of the same-directional double-lane road■Action・EGO detects parked vehicles. Using some part of the other lane EGO swerves the parked vehicles. After swerving it moves back its lane.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0044 There are parked vehicles on the both sides ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There are parked vehicles on both sides of the opposite-directional double-lane road■Action・EGO detects parked vehicles. EGO stops at safe distance[D] due that as EGO must stay in its lane.■Success condition・EGO stops at safe distance[D]■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0045 Stop due pedestrian ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a parked vehicle on the roadside of the opposite-directional double-lane road. A pedestrian getting into the parked vehicle■Action・EGO detects parked vehicle and pedestrian. It stops gently at safe distance[D] from parked vehicle. After the parked vehicle starts to run, EGO continues to drive while maintaining a safe distance[D].■Success condition・EGO stops at safe distance[D]■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/hVp: [2, 3, 5] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0046 ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There is a parked vehicle on the roadside of the same-directional double-lane road. A pedestrian getting into the parked vehicle■Action・EGO detects parked vehicle and pedestrian. It stops gently at safe distance[D] from parked vehicle. After the parked vehicle starts to run, EGO continues to drive while maintaining a safe distance[D].■Success condition・EGO stops at safe distance[D] and reaches the destination■Failure condition・Collide with the parked vehicle or pedestrian Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0047 Driving backward ■Initial condition・EGO is driving backward■Action・EGO is able to drive backward■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [5, 10, 15] km/h LSA-CAM-0048 Obstacle on the road ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There are garbage cans on right side of the same-directional double-lane road■Action・EGO detects garbage cans. Using some part of the other lane EGO swerves the garbage cans. After swerving it moves back its lane.■Success condition・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition・Collide with the garbage cans Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hD[safe distance] : 3m LSA-CAM-0049 Obstacle on the road ■Initial condition・EGO is running at Ve. There are garbage cans on the right side of the opposite-directional double-lane road■Action・EGO detects garbage cans. EGO stops at safe distance[D] due that EGO must stay in its lane.■Success condition・EGO stops at safe distance[D]■Failure condition・Collide with the garbage cans Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0050 There is a parked vehicle in the road shoulder ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There's a shoulder lane to the right. There's a parked vehicle on the shoulder lane■Action ・EGO detects the parked vehicle and avoids it by swerving move back to the center line after it passed the parked vehicle.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC (on the shoulder lane or opposite lane) Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0051 There is a parked vehicle in the shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There's a shoulder lane to the right. There's a parked vehicle on the shoulder lane■Action ・EGO detects the parked vehicle, avoids it by changing lane and move back to its lane after it passed the parked vehicle.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0052 There is a vehicle in the shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There's a shoulder lane to the right. NPC driving in shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO detects NPC in the shoulder lane and continues to drive while maintaining a safe distance from that NPC in the shoulder lane. EGO must stay behind the NPC in the shoulder lane. ■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0053 There are bicyclists in the bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There's a bike-way to the right and there are bicyclist in bike-way■Action ・EGO detects bicyclist in the bike-way, continues to drive and bicyclist passes gently■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with bicyclist Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] LSA-CAM-0054 Pull out in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in empty shoulder lane■Action ・EGO pulls out in shoulder lane■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0055 Pull out in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in shoulder lane. NPC is running at Vf in shoulder lane. And there is an NPC in other lane .■Action ・EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the shoulder lane. EGO follows the NPC in the lane until NPC pulls over.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0056 Pull out in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in shoulder lane. NPC is running at Vf in shoulder lane And there is an NPC coming from behind on the other lane at Vf■Action ・EGO waits for the vehicle in the left lane to pass. EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the shoulder lane■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0057 Pull out in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in shoulder lane. There is an parked vehicle in shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the shoulder lane.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0058 Pull out behavior in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in shoulder lane. bicyclist is running at Vb in shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO pulls out the shoulder lane keeping a safe distance[D] from the bicyclist.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with bicyclist Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0059 Pull out behavior in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in empty bicycle way■Action ・EGO pulls out in bike-way■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0060 Pull out behavior in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in bicycle way. There is an parked vehicle in bicycle way.■Action ・EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the bikeway.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0061 Pull out behavior in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in bicycle way. NPC is running at Vf in bicycle way. And there is an NPC in other lane .■Action ・EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the bikeway. EGO follows the NPC in the lane until NPC pulls over.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0062 Pull out behavior in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve in bicycle way. NPC is running at Vf in bicycle way. And there is an NPC coming from behind on the other lane at Vf■Action ・EGO waits for the vehicle in the left lane to pass. EGO pulls out at a safe distance[D] from the vehicle on the bike way■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0063 Pull over behavior in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve.■Action ・EGO pulls over in shoulder lane■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0064 Pull over in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are multiple parked vehicle in the shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO pulls over, keeping a safe distance between two vehicles ■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h[D] Safe Distance: 3 LSA-CAM-0065 Pull over in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are multiple parked bicycle in the shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO pulls over in shoulder lane after passing all parked bicycle■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with bicycle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0066 Pull over in shoulder lane (dynamic objects) ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There's a shoulder lane to the right and there are pedestrians in shoulder lane■Action ・EGO pulls over, keeping a safe distance between pedestrians■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with pedestrian Ve: [10] km/h. D=10m (longer than safe distance for static objects), the speed while looking for the safe space should be defined. LSA-CAM-0067 Pull over in shoulder lane (Static objects) ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are garbage cans in the shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO pulls over, keeping a safe distance between garbage cans■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with the garbage cans Ve: [10, 20] km/h, D= 1m (front)/1m (back), 4m (vehicle length) LSA-CAM-0068 Pull over in shoulder lane ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC in the shoulder lane.■Action ・EGO tries to pull over but there is a parked vehicle in the destination point for this reason EGO finds an another available area to pull over.■Success condition ・EGO stops at new location■Failure condition ・Collide with parked vehicle Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0069 Pull over in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve.■Action ・EGO pulls over in bike-way■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination・Safely pull over■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0070 Pull over in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are multiple parked vehicle in the bicycle way.■Action ・EGO pulls over in bike-way after passing all parked vehicle■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination・Safely pull over■Failure condition ・Collide with NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0071 Pull over in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There is an NPC and bicyclist in the bicycle way.■Action ・(1) Bicyclist drives at Vb on bike-way. A pedestrian waits in the bike-way. EGO waits for bicyclist to pass. EGO pulls over at safe distance[D] to pedestrian・(2) Bicyclist drives at Vb on bike-way. A pedestrian leaves the bikeway at Vp. EGO waits for bicyclist and pedestrian to pass and pulls over.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination・Safely pull over■Failure condition ・Collide with bicyclist or pedestrian Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/hVp: [0, 2, 3, 5] km/h LSA-CAM-0072 Pull over in bicycle way ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are bicyclists in the bi-directional bicycle way.■Action ・Bicyclist drives at Vb on bike-way. EGO waits for bicyclists to pass. EGO pulls over■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination・Safely pull over■Failure condition ・Collide with bicyclists Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb: [10, 12, 15] km/h LSA-CAM-0073 Driving narrow road ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. The lane gets narrower.■Action ・EGO using part of the bike-way continues the driving.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0074 Driving narrow road ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. The lane gets narrower. And there are multiple bicyclists in bicycle way■Action ・Bicyclists drives at Vb on bike-way. EGO waits for bicyclist to pass. EGO using part of the bike-way continues the driving■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with bicyclist Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVb:[10, 12, 15] km/h LSA-CAM-0075 Merging roads ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. An NPC is running at Vf.■Action ・While NPC drives on the road, EGO makes a right turn. if they meet at the end of the road EGO stops and waits for the NPC to pass.if they don't meet the EGO continues to drive.■Success condition ・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・Collide with the NPC Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0076 Re-routing ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There is a closed road in EGO’s route.■Action ・EGO detects the closed road and creates a new route. Even if it is not the shortest route, EGO follows this route. ■Success condition ・EGO creates a new route・EGO reaches the destination■Failure condition ・EGO doesn’t create a new route and doesn’t reach the destination Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0077 Parking ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. And it'll park in empty parking spot ■Action EGO chooses a parking spot and parked■Success condition ・EGO parks (reverse parking)■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't park Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0078 Parking ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. And it'll park. There are two vehicle in the parking spot■Action (1) EGO can park between two vehicles (2) EGO can park last empty parking spot■Success condition ・EGO parks■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't park or collides other parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0079 Parking ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. And it'll park. There are two vehicle in the parking spot. But one of them is going to move■Action (1) EGO can wait until the first vehicle leaves the parking spot and it can parked there.(2) EGO can park second or last empty parking spot■Success condition ・EGO parks■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't park or collides other parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0080 Parking ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. There are multiple parked vehicle in the parking spot.■Action ・EGO parks in parking spot before parked vehicles■Success condition ・EGO parks■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't park or collides other parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/h LSA-CAM-0081 Parking ■Initial condition ・EGO is running at Ve. And it'll park. There are two vehicle in the parking spot. But one of them is going to move■Action (1) EGO can park any empty parking spot(2) EGO can wait until the second vehicle leaves the parking spot and it can parked there.■Success condition ・EGO parks■Failure condition ・EGO doesn't park or collides other parked vehicles Ve: [10, 20, 30] km/hVf: [10, 20, 30] km/h

docs.title: System Configuration
docs.text:
(To be completed)

The section describes the system configuration of the PoV vehicles. It shows the options to design your own PoV vehicles. The configuration consists of ECU selection, development approach, middleware candidates, etc.

docs.title: Hardware Selection
docs.text:
The PoV software stack heavily relies on the inference models, which means high performant GPU is required.

TODO: Prefer x86 or ARM

TODO: The spec of the GPU requirement

TODO: Is it possible to use NPU like Halio-8

docs.title: Development Approach
docs.text:
• Native Installation: Direct installation on hardware for maximum performance
  • Containerized Development: Reproducible environments with easier team collaboration (recommended for ARM)

docs.title: Middleware Choice
docs.text:
Now the PoV supports two kinds of pipeline:

  • ROS: Able to bridge with the existing Autoware system.
  • Zenoh: High performant middleware.

docs.title: Version
docs.text: There are 4 versions on the roadmap.
